```{r, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
  require("visCOS")
  require("magrittr")
```

## Calculate Objective Function
xxx
```{r}
  d_raw <- pour(runoff_example) # get example runoff
  d_runoff <- d_raw %>% prepare.remove_chunk %>% prepare.only_observed
  head(d_runoff)
```

```{r}
  d_runoff <- prepare.complete_date(d_runoff)
  d_runoff <- prepare.periods(d_runoff, start_month = 9, end_month = 8)
```

```{r}
  bOF <- serve.period_ofun(d_runoff)
  unlist(bOF)
```
